info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 03 at 8:44PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Iredell and southwestern Rowan Counties through 915 PM EDT... At 844 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Statesville, or near Cleveland, moving southwest at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mooresville, Troutman, Cleveland, Lake Norman State Park, Lake Norman, Mount Ulla, Piedmont Research Station and Doolie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
